note:
non binary, poly, aro, queer, pan, demi, sex-positive, kinky, late dx autism +adhd, autigender.

here: Neurodiv. + haiku.

no pronouns. evolving. be kind.

i struggle with language incl. correct pronouns AND I defend/use chosen/neo pronouns.

no terfs,+swerfs, blm, no gossip. bitchy about discrimination, also ageism, sp. from queers: you/we should know better, not reproduce exclusion + platitudes.

329ppm

Berlin, DE.

#haiku #actuallyautistic #enby #queer #berlin #demi #aro #bdsm

fields.name: pronouns
fields.value: none, they, evolving, and yes, I also struggle with that

fields.name: Profile photo
fields.value: a blurred picture of my face and arm in a waving movement. with some effort and probably hope, you may see that I am smiling in the pic.

fields.name: banner
fields.value: a paining: truth is good. if you click on it, a part of my face with my eye is on the left side. yes, I sort of want to be anonymous to talk freely about my autism.
